stimulusHtml: A block moving to the right on a level surface with friction is pulled by an increasing horizontal force also directed to the right. As the applied force increases, which of the following is true of the normal force and the frictional force on the block?
choicesHtml:
Normal Force Frictional Force
Increases Increases
Normal Force Frictional Force
Increases Remains constant
Normal Force Frictional Force
Remains constant Increases
Normal Force Frictional Force
Remains constant Decreases
Normal Force Frictional Force
Remains constant Remains constant
